reviewText: Once again Jesus Adrian Romero just nails it! The song, the music, the DVD as a whole. Is just awesome! Buy it! DVD: Soplando Vida Live (DVD) Music: Soplando Vida
It is fantastic. The music is very good. The video is excellent. Highly recommend if you are into Hispanic Christian music.

The music on this DVD is great; there is even a plus when the DVD is over--about 15 more minutes of songs.  The camera work is a bit amateurish--a LOT of movement.  I think I'm going to get the CD also--then I can enjoy it in the car.

J.A.R. is one of my favorite worship artists. I was so excited to receive this dvd only to be disappointed. The dvd didn't work in my dvd player and it made a lot of noise and froze my computer before it played. Sent it back.
This is Jesus Adrian Romero's best DVD yet!  And the previous ones were really good too!  The music, ministry and worship is fresh, genuine and will captivate your soul.
For the honor and glory of God. JAR has created an album that is full of anointing. God is glorify through this inspirational album
Llego antes de lo esperado, Muy puntuales a la hora de entregar el producto, la nica,observacin es que el CD VENIA RAYADO.

I just got the DVD and in My opinion they should have this on Blue Ray cuality, I don't know why they shot this on SD. I love Jesus Adrian and compare to de CD I think that the Live version gives more reality of an concert. I do recommended it.
Un autor que nos trae mensajes de amor , gracias jesus adrian por estos mensajes de vida sigue soplando esa gran calidad

i barely know ANY spanglish, and yet, the Holy Spirit's anointing IS SO STRONG, that i found myself staying and being ministered to and so very richly BLESSED!!!
So grateful for TBN'S commitment to excellence in Christian Programming!!!
Pues me parece que esta bueno el DVD, Dios bendiga a todos aquellos que hacen msica para EL...Soplando Vida Live (DVD)
Love! We need more Spanish Christian music like this in America <3
Great music
love it
Beautiful! Thanks!
Very nice dvd of gospel songs in Spanish
Great!

The dvd was amazing and inspiring it comes with bonus features where Jesus Adrian Romero is singing cansado del camino and other songs i was crying during the song it was amazing . Im hoping to go see him live in miami FL on December 6th even though its like 12 days before my wedding and its a 28 hour drive but it will be worth it.
This album is wonderful. Very enjoyable and you get to the soul. Beautiful songs and a duet exquisite make this DVD one of my favorites and it makes you want to see it again and again

very very good,

I really liked this DVD. Since I didn't get to go to JAR's concert, I decided I had to buy the DVD!!!.. :)
